article_title: Mississippi's sugar daddy is Uncle Sam
article_text: Mississippi gets almost half of its state budget from the federal government. Federal grants pay Mississippi' cities hundreds of millions each year. You can say the state gets a good return on investment for the federal taxes its residents pay.

article_summary:
You can say the state gets a good return on investment for the federal taxes its residents pay.
Federal grants pay Mississippi' cities hundreds of millions each year.
Mississippi gets almost half of its state budget from the federal government.
